hero.title: Bounce Into a <1>Stronger</1> <2>You</2>
hero.subtitle: Experience the revolutionary Kangoo Jumps fitness program. Low-impact, high-energy workouts that transform your body while protecting your joints.

about.title: About <1>SM</1>
about.description1: Welcome! I'm Sladjana Marković, your certified Kangoo Jumps instructor and the only licensed trainer in our area. My journey with Kangoo Jumps began three years ago when I discovered this incredible low-impact, high-energy workout that transformed not just my body, but my entire approach to fitness.
about.description2: After experiencing the amazing benefits firsthand - from increased cardiovascular health to improved joint protection - I knew I had to share this with others. I became certified to bring this revolutionary fitness program to our community.
about.description3: Every class I teach is designed to be inclusive, fun, and effective. Whether you're a fitness beginner or an experienced athlete, Kangoo Jumps offers something special for everyone.
about.certifiedDesc: Licensed Kangoo Jumps instructor with international certification
about.passionateDesc: Dedicated to helping clients achieve their fitness goals safely
about.communityDesc: Creating supportive fitness communities that inspire growth
about.resultsDesc: Proven track record of transforming lives through fitness

kangoo.title: What is <1>Kangoo Jumps</1>?
kangoo.description: Kangoo Jumps is a revolutionary fitness program that combines cardio training and body shaping exercises in a fun way, using specially designed rebound shoes that provide incredible benefits for your body and mind.
kangoo.scienceDesc1: Kangoo Jumps use specially designed rebound shoes with a patented spring system that reduces impact on your joints while maximizing cardiovascular benefits and muscle toning.
kangoo.scienceDesc2: Originally developed for rehabilitation, these shoes have evolved into one of the most effective and enjoyable fitness programs available today. The unique bouncing motion engages your core, improves balance, and provides a full-body workout like no other.
kangoo.scienceDesc3: Studies show that Kangoo Jumps can burn up to 25% more calories than traditional aerobics while being gentler on your body than walking on concrete.
kangoo.jointDesc: Reduces impact on joints by up to 80%, making it perfect for all ages and fitness levels
kangoo.cardioDesc: Burns more calories than traditional workouts while feeling like you're having fun
kangoo.funDesc: Experience the joy of bouncing while getting an incredible full-body workout
kangoo.levelsDesc: Suitable for beginners to advanced athletes, with modifications for everyone

programs.title: Choose Your <1>Perfect</1> Program
programs.description: From gentle rehabilitation to high-intensity training, we have a Kangoo Jumps program designed specifically for your fitness level and goals.
programs.beginnerDesc: Perfect introduction to Kangoo Jumps. Learn basic movements and build confidence in a supportive environment.
programs.powerDesc: High-energy workout combining cardio bursts with strength training. Perfect for experienced participants.
programs.gentleDesc: Low-impact session designed for seniors, those with injuries, or anyone seeking gentle movement.
programs.danceDesc: Combine the joy of dance with the benefits of Kangoo Jumps. Express yourself while getting fit!
programs.notSureTitle: Not Sure Which Program is Right for You?
programs.notSureDesc: I'm here to help you choose the perfect program for your fitness level and goals. Let's have a conversation about what you're looking to achieve.

schedule.title: Book Your <1>Next</1> Session
schedule.description: Choose from our variety of Kangoo Jumps classes throughout the week. All classes include equipment and are suitable for different fitness levels.
schedule.healthConditions: Any health conditions or special requirements?

testimonials.title: What Our <1>Community</1> Says
testimonials.description: Real transformations from real people. Discover how Kangoo Jumps has changed lives and helped our community achieve their fitness goals.
testimonials.readyTitle: Ready to Start Your Own Success Story?
testimonials.readyDesc: Join our amazing community and discover what Kangoo Jumps can do for you. Your transformation journey starts with a single bounce!

testimonial1.name: Zorana
testimonial1.text: I didn’t believe I would stay and keep going. Massages only helped temporarily, but when I started training, my back stopped hurting and I no longer had problems with my shoulder blade. I literally used to cry from the pain, sometimes I’d stiffen up and the pain would spread to my lungs. During this training period, I’ve been more than satisfied. I adjusted my diet and really sweat a lot during training. The difference is obvious. I’m definitely not giving up, even after achieving results.
testimonial1.before: Back problems and right shoulder blade. Lactic acid on the right side of the shoulder and blade.
testimonial1.after: No more pain in the back and shoulder blade.

testimonial2.name: Marija
testimonial2.text: When I started training, it was December and I weighed 107 kilograms. That was the first time I tried Kango. By regularly attending training sessions, I weighed 90 kg in April. I really enjoy the workouts because they fill me with new energy, and I especially love that every session is different from the last.

testimonial3.name: Dijana
testimonial3.text: This workout is for the soul and body! I’m overjoyed to be part of this journey! I eagerly look forward to every training session.

faq.title: Frequently Asked <1>Questions</1>
faq.description: Got questions about Kangoo Jumps? Here are answers to the most common questions I receive from new and current clients.
faq.stillHaveDesc: I'm here to help! Don't hesitate to reach out if you have specific questions about Kangoo Jumps, class schedules, or anything else. I love talking about fitness and helping people find the right program for their needs.
faq.responseTime: I typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours. For urgent questions, feel free to call or text me directly.

questions.q1: What should I wear to my first Kangoo Jumps class?
questions.a1: Wear comfortable athletic clothing that allows for movement. I'll provide the Kangoo Jumps shoes for your first class. Bring a water bottle and a towel. For regular participants, I recommend moisture-wicking fabrics and supportive athletic wear.
questions.q2: Do I need any prior fitness experience?
questions.a2: Absolutely not! Kangoo Jumps is suitable for all fitness levels. I offer beginner-friendly classes where you'll learn the basics at your own pace. The shoes do most of the work, making it easier on your joints than traditional exercise.
questions.q3: How many calories can I burn in a class?
questions.a3: You can burn between 300-600 calories per class, depending on the intensity level and your body weight. The unique bouncing motion increases caloric burn by up to 25% compared to traditional aerobics while feeling easier on your body.
questions.q4: Is Kangoo Jumps safe for people with joint problems?
questions.a4: Yes! Kangoo Jumps was originally developed for rehabilitation. The rebound shoes reduce impact on joints by up to 80%. However, I always recommend consulting with your doctor before starting any new exercise program, especially if you have existing health conditions.
questions.q5: What if I have balance issues?
questions.a5: The Kangoo Jump shoes actually help improve balance over time! I start beginners with basic movements and provide support throughout the class. The shoes have a low center of gravity that makes them surprisingly stable once you get used to them.
questions.a6: I offer flexible pricing options including drop-in rates, class packages, and monthly memberships. Contact me for current pricing and special introductory offers for new clients. I also offer free consultations to help you choose the right program.
questions.q7: What size shoes do you have available?
questions.a7: I have Kangoo Jump boots available in sizes from 36 to 42. I will help you find the perfect fit during your first visit to ensure comfort and safety.
questions.q8: Can I try a class before committing?
questions.a8: Absolutely! I encourage everyone to try a beginner class first. This gives you a chance to experience Kangoo Jumps, meet me, and see if it's right for you. Equipment is provided for your trial class.

contact.title: Let's Start Your <1>Journey</1>
contact.description: Ready to bounce into fitness? Have questions about classes? I'm here to help you get started on your Kangoo Jumps adventure.
contact.quickWhatsappDesc: Get instant answers to your questions! Message me on WhatsApp for the fastest response.

footer.tagline: Transforming lives through the joy of Kangoo Jumps. Join our community and discover the fun, effective way to achieve your fitness goals.
footer.certified: Certified Kangoo Jumps Instructor • Licensed & Insured
